widget.name: Sina Weibo For The World
widget.description: This extension adds a number of features to the popular Sina Weibo Microblogging service to enable non-native Chinese speakers to interact with everyday Chinese people (and vice versa!). This extension for the Opera browser adds the Google Translate bar that will translate all pages in to your own native language. It also includes a handy translate-as-you-type feature when you click in any text box available on the site allowing you to say something in your native language and have that posted in Chinese. This is a work in progress to connect disparate global voices. If we communicate then we will forever be friends.
widget.author: Rich Tibbett
